subtasks: Planting multiple crops (rye, peas, sunflowers, edible beans, soybeans, alfalfa, and wheat)
Managing diverse farming operations (diverse crop rotation)
Operating a feedlot facility (Hollywood Feeders in Toronto, South Dakota)
Piling bedding material (straw) for livestock in a sloped barn
Spreading manure and compost on agricultural fields (works with a vertical spreader)
Turning compost piles (using an excavator and a windrow Turner machine)
Building windrows for compost (managing moisture and temperature)
Combining manure and organic materials (straw, hay, and water for compost)
Applying lime and compost to fields (using tackle trucks and spreaders)
Maintaining horse stables (cleaning stalls, collecting manure)
Composting animal manure (managing odors and pathogens)
Testing and developing compost recipes for different crops (corn, sugar beets, pasture)
Educating others about the benefits of composting (sharing knowledge and techniques)
Adapting to regulatory requirements (complying with state and EPA permits)
Marketing compost as a premium soil amendment
Utilizing infrastructure from other farm operations (feedlot runoff management)
Managing equipment for efficient composting (tracking machine usage and maintenance)

tasks.task: ** Planting and managing diverse crops (rye, peas, sunflowers, edible beans, soybeans, alfalfa, wheat)
** Spreading manure and compost on agricultural fields
** Applying lime and compost to fields
** Maintaining a horse farm (cleaning stalls, managing manure)
